contents.text: Thank you for calling Ask Media Group in the East Bay, where we build digital experiences that educate and inform millions every day.
For advertising solutions and sponsorship opportunities, press 1.
To learn about our brand advertising packages, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist in brand advertising.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and feature details for brand advertising packages.
I’d like details on brand advertising packages to promote my veteran outreach program.
I need the detailed media kit and audience segmentation analytics for your brand advertising packages, including integration guidelines.
I need someone to explain your brand advertising packages and help me choose the right one.
I’d like to discuss brand advertising options to promote my physics blog to a broader audience.

contents.text: To explore sponsored content partnerships, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sponsored content team.

navigationGoals: Discuss options for a sponsored content partnership.
I’m interested in developing a sponsored content campaign to share veterans’ stories.
I'd like to discuss a sponsored content partnership, specifically workflow integration, CMS plugins, and performance metrics.
I want to discuss a sponsored content partnership to promote my small business.
I’m interested in sponsoring an educational content series to feature my physics experiment write-ups.

contents.text: For B2B software demonstrations and support services, press 2.
To schedule a demo of our platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a platform demonstration specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a quick demo of the B2B platform.
I need to schedule a demo of your ad management platform for my nonprofit organization.
I want to schedule a technical demo of your B2B platform, focusing on API endpoints, integration workflows, and dashboard features.
I'd like to schedule a live demonstration of your platform so I can see how it works.
I want to schedule a demo of your platform to see if it can help organize my physics lab group work.

contents.text: For technical support or service inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue with the software service.
I’m having trouble logging into the platform and need technical support.
I'm experiencing an API authentication error with your SDK and need technical support to troubleshoot the OAuth handshake.
I'm having trouble with the software and need to speak with technical support.
I need technical support troubleshooting the software tools I’m using for my quantum mechanics simulations.
